content.body: One of my colleagues at Mozilla pointed out this site to me: https://test262.report/. He found it useful for tracking status across implementers. It was being maintained by bocoup, but they stopped last autumn due to some changes to services made by CircleCI that the site relied upon. I thought I would mention it here, in case someone was interested in taking over the maintenance or adding something similar to the tc39.es site.
i think lots of folks are interested in maintaining it, the trouble is finding someone to pay for it, and potentially also convincing bocoup to donate it
